title: [1.16.5—1.14.4][Terrestria——更多生物群系]再见红枫林[来自搬运悬赏令]
author: 零尘233
txt_content:
本帖最后由 零尘233 于 2021-1-29 13:37 编辑 

Terrestria



简介
Terrestria是一个增加更多生物群系的模组，其通过Fabric Mod API运行加载。Terrestria增加了17个主要生物群系，24个附属生物群系，9种原木及相应的树叶，从而增强了游戏玩法-提供了令人耳目一新的生物群系。Terrestria一直在为制作什么样的生态群系进行激烈的抉择，此模组通过不断增加生物群系细节，直到让生态群系看起来足够生动而逼真。与其添加大量不同的生物群系，不如着眼于添加少量的生物群系，然后在它们中填充大量的细节和其他附属生物群系。与现有的生物群系进行相比，这种更改带来了更加棒的视觉体验。


搬运授权
出处：https://github.com/TerraformersMC/Terrestria/pull/94
汉化
该模组汉化已经完成
推荐模组及兼容
姐妹模组:Traverse （同样是增加主世界生物群系的模组）都需要使用Fabric API
Cinderscapes（丰富地狱生物群系的模组）
野营物品


汉化
该模组汉化已经完成

发现了问题？
如果发现问题，请在github的issue上进行反馈

下载链接
wiki


模组更新记录
（注：本模组更新内容记录不包含Minecraft快照版本的游戏更新）
Terrestria v1.2.1 for Minecraft 1.15.2: A Bugfix UpdateAdd custom boats to the minecraft:boats tag (you can now use terrestria boats as fuel) (#93)Willow and cypress trees no longer grow through obstructions (not replacing them, but still growing around them) (#98)Doors no longer allow you to see through the world (#102)Boats no longer disappear and teleport to (0, 0, 0) when spawned (#103)Terrestria v1.2.0: The Color UpdateMuch more vibrant biome colors, thanks to SuperCoder79! Previously, Terrestria only used vanilla grass colors. This should make it much closer to Traverse in biome vibrance.Native Climatic World Type compatibilityAn improved Chinese translationFixed render layersUpdate to 1.15.2Fix "crusty" inventory textures caused by partially transparent pixels appearing fully opaque
Terrestria 2.0.0 Changelog:New Biomes:+ Canyon Cliffs+ Canyon Arches+ Canyon Edge+ Dunes+ Dunes Edge+ Lush Desert+ Oasis+ Outback+ Outback Uluru+ Outback BushlandNew Trees:+ Saguaro Cactus+ Shrubs+ Yucca Palm TreeNew Structures:+ Canyon Arches+ Dum Dum HeadsNew Plants:+ Aloe Vera+ Agave+ Dead Grass+ Tiny CactusGeneral New Things:+ Added Andisol Farmland+ Added a config option to disable OptiLeaves+ Added config option for Underwater Volcanos+ Added config option for Quarter LogsChanges:* Renamed Basalt to Volcanic Rock* Renamed Basalt Dirt to Andisol* Added recipies for all types of leaf pile blocks* Recolored boat item textures to reflect vanilla style- Removed Climatic World Type Features+ Added vanilla villages to almost all biomes+ Added Ruined Portals to all biomesImprovements:* Refactored WoodBlocks* Rewrote SmallLog Tree Functionality* Removed Tree Components in favor of 1.16 vanilla system* Now using terraformersmc/shapes for some generation
Terrestria 2.0.1 Changelog:
- Fixed small log leaves culling issues- Fixed oak stripped small log tint issue- Fixed Yucca Palm leaves fast graphics texture- Fixed missing biome translations for dunes and outback biomes- Fixed certain desert plants being plantable on dirt- Andisol Podzol can now be snowy
Terrestria 2.0.2 Changelog:
- Fixed laggy conifer biomes and made them look pretty- Wood blocks now have axe as the correct tool- leaves can now be broken faster with hoes- tiny cacti now hurt the player- sakura logs no longer drop the wrong wood type- yucca palm now drops blocks- all desert plants now drop blocks
Terrestria 2.0.3 Changelog:
- Added French Translation (Hugman)- Made unobtainable saplings obtainable- Fix a load of loot tables- Patch some feature generation to act like you would expect it to- add missing recipes- Tweak some biome colors
Terrestria 2.0.4 Changelog:
- add support for canvas leaves shaders- Fix volcanos generating too large and too frequently- Added oak shrubs to dense woodlands
Terrestria 2.0.6 Changelog:
- Add wavy cattails for canvas support- Added Chinese, Spanish, and Polish Translations- Fixed lang key mispelling of bushland biomes- Added common tags for basalt blocks (mod compatibility improvements- Leaves no longer suffocate entities- Fixed certain leaves not easily broken by a hoe- Fixed Andisol Grass Path not having an item- Fixed Andisol Grass Blocks not being eaten by sheep- Fixed sandy trees having dirt below them- Fixed Andisol Grass Blocks spreading improperly- Fixed small oak logs not having oak log recipes- Fixed localization for Potted Yucca Palm Saplings
Terrestria 2.1.0 Changelog:- Hotfix for crash with Traverse beta
Terrestria 2.1.2 Changelog:- Fix crash with Lithium when loading a world
Terrestria v2.1.6 for 1.16.5- Include required Fabric API modules in the jar - it is no longer necessary to download Fabric API separately for Terrestria- Fix crash loading corrupted / malformed config files, and improved error messages- Fix block break particles for andisol grass and small oak logs being tinted green- Fix sakura trees not growing leaf piles- Fix some trees not growing when you place blocks next to the sapling- Fix andisol farmland reverting to vanilla dirt in some cases- Fix all villagers spawned in terrestria biomes being Plains villagers- Fix issues with caves not cutting through smooth sandstone and red sand- Fix Terrestria trees not generating quarter logs




本帖更新记录

2020-01-05正式发帖
2020-10-24更新模板及版本

因为不知道卡尔德拉是啥地形 抱歉...
我去改改但是问题是翻译词条中有这三项 死火山口好像不咋试用
"biome.terrestria.caldera": "Caldera",
  "biome.terrestria.caldera_ridge": "Caldera Ridge",
  "biome.terrestria.caldera_beach": "Caldera Beach",复制代码

replies.author: 清秋
replies.txt_content:
我去仔细查了查，发现死火山条目下就有个地形叫做破火山口。
破火山口
一种在火山顶部的较大的圆形拗陷，其直径往往大于1英里。通常是岩浆回撤、火山自身塌陷时形成，或浅部岩浆囊喷发而形成的。
大量岩浆的撤退可能是由于其构造支撑的丧失而造成的。在西班牙语中Caldera意为罐或大锅，在Canary岛原来指锅底状的拗陷，而不管其成因。
破火山口直径可达8-16公里，而火山口直径通常不超过1-1.6公里，主要是在火山喷发期间由于爆炸而挖掘出来的。

而百度出的破火山口的资料里面有这样一段话：
倘若有一块接近圆形的岩块沉落陷入岩浆穴当中，使下方岩浆受到上方压力而沿圆形周围的裂隙垂直窜升，冷却之后造成环状岩墙，因此锅状的火山口通常伴随着被被蚀的环状岩墙构造。
似可将Caldera Ridge翻译成“火山口岩壁”，因为根据生成出的地形图以及现实的单纯的因为沉降而形成的破火山口，mod生成的更像是直接因为单纯沉降而生成的地形（我参考的是莫纳洛亚火山口莫纳洛亚火山口）。
周围的沙滩就有点离谱了，再怎么样也不会形成这种因沉积作用而生成的沙滩。。因为根本没有沉积发生的几大要素，最多只能靠静止的水侵蚀岩壁而形成岩滩。。。虽然mc确实没有岩滩这种说法，其实改换成沙砾来填充这个群系更为科学。

参考：
死火山
破火山
沙滩
